content.question: Which of the following describes a policy employed by the Chinese government to establish legitimacy with ethnic minorities?

choices.label: Use of military force to suppress popular uprisings
Creation of special economic zones (SEZs) to reduce inequality
Representation in the National People’s Congress
Promotion of migration from western provinces to more prosperous coastal regions

content.answer: Representation in the National People’s Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
